sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-snackbar v-model="snackbar">
    {{ toast.text }}
    <v-btn :color="getColor()" text @click="snackbar = false">
        Close
    </v-btn>
</v-snackbar>
</template>

<script>
import {
    mapState
} from 'vuex'
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            color: 'green',
            text: '123131',
            snackbar: false
        }
    },
    computed: {
        ...mapState('app', ['showToast', 'toast']),
    },
    watch: {
        showToast: function (val) {
            this.snackbar = true;
        }
    },
    created() {

    },
    methods: {
        getColor: function () {
            switch (this.toast.type) {
                case 'success':
                    return '#4caf50';
                    case 'info': 
                    return '#4D96CB';
                        case 'error':
                            return '#ff5252';
                            case 'warning' : 
                            return '#f44336'
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
